risk_rationale: Four business-requested entities are missing from the catalog (delivery performance, products, purchase orders, suppliers), and all four analyzed entities have low articulation (45/100) with validation warnings. Missing entities are a P0 blocking condition; combined with uniformly low scores this creates immediate business and governance risk.

recommendations.description: Business-requested entity 'delivery performance' (výkonnost dodávek) is missing from the metadata/catalog.
recommendations.action: Create a Collibra asset for 'delivery performance (výkonnost dodávek)'. Populate a clear bilingual (EN/CZ) business description, assign a business owner/steward with contact info, set relevant technical links (Unity Catalog table if available), and publish. Run Collibra → Unity Catalog sync so the asset appears in the catalog used by consumers.
recommendations.estimated_impact: Removes the P0 block for this business request and enables governance and discovery for delivery performance.

recommendations.description: Business-requested entity 'products' (produkty) is missing from the metadata/catalog.
recommendations.action: Create a Collibra asset for 'products (produkty)' with a bilingual business description, assign owner/steward, attach examples and primary keys, and publish. Sync to Unity Catalog.
recommendations.estimated_impact: Restores discoverability for product data and satisfies the business request.

recommendations.description: Business-requested entity 'purchase orders' (nákupní objednávky) is missing from the metadata/catalog.
recommendations.action: Create a Collibra asset for 'purchase orders (nákupní objednávky)' including a business description, owner/steward, and mapping to factv_purchase_order (if that is the technical table). Publish and sync to Unity Catalog.
recommendations.estimated_impact: Unblocks business users and links the business term to the technical asset (factv_purchase_order).

recommendations.description: Business-requested entity 'suppliers' (dodavatelé) is missing from the metadata/catalog.
recommendations.action: Create a Collibra asset for 'suppliers (dodavatelé)' with bilingual description, assign owner/steward, and map to dimv_supplier technical table. Publish and sync to Unity Catalog.
recommendations.estimated_impact: Enables supplier data governance and discovery; links business and technical metadata.

recommendations.description: factv_purchase_order shows a 'warning' validation and low articulation (45) — likely missing a complete business description and owner.
recommendations.action: In Collibra, add a clear business description (purpose, key measures, example rows), assign a business owner/steward and contact, and confirm technical metadata (schema, primary keys). Publish and sync to Unity Catalog.
recommendations.estimated_impact: +20–30 articulation score; unblocks business use and incident response.

recommendations.description: factv_delivery_performance has a warning and low articulation score; business context or owner is likely missing.
recommendations.action: Add a bilingual business description in Collibra, assign a data owner/steward, include sample queries and consumers, then publish and sync to Unity Catalog.
recommendations.estimated_impact: +20–30 articulation score; improves trust and usability.

recommendations.description: dimv_supplier shows a warning and low articulation; likely missing owner and business description.
recommendations.action: Add a business description in Collibra describing supplier attributes and hierarchy, assign an owner/steward, and sync to Unity Catalog.
recommendations.estimated_impact: +15–25 articulation score; clearer stewardship and easier onboarding.

recommendations.description: dimv_product has a warning and low articulation score; business description or owner is likely missing.
recommendations.action: Add a business description (product hierarchy, common usage), assign business owner/steward in Collibra, and sync to Unity Catalog.

recommendations.description: Lineage and transformation details for factv_purchase_order are likely incomplete (validation=warning).
recommendations.action: Document end-to-end lineage in Collibra: upstream sources, ETL/SQL transforms, schedule, and downstream consumers. Link to notebooks or ETL jobs and ensure lineage sync to Unity Catalog lineage views.
recommendations.estimated_impact: Improves traceability and reduces investigation time; expected +10–20 quality improvement.

recommendations.description: Lineage for factv_delivery_performance is insufficiently documented.
recommendations.action: Add upstream source definitions, transformation logic, and consumer lists in Collibra; sync lineage to Unity Catalog and attach representative queries or notebooks.

recommendations.description: Governance tags/classifications (sensitivity, retention) appear missing or incomplete for dimv_supplier.
recommendations.action: Apply data classification, sensitivity level, and retention policy tags in Collibra for dimv_supplier and propagate these tags to Unity Catalog. Document handling rules in the Collibra asset.
recommendations.estimated_impact: Improves compliance and policy enforcement; small gain in consumer confidence.

recommendations.description: Governance tags and glossary links are missing or incomplete for dimv_product.
recommendations.action: Attach governance tags (classification, retention) and business glossary links in Collibra and sync to Unity Catalog for dimv_product.

recommendations.description: Bilingual (EN/CZ) descriptions are inconsistent or missing; business request used Czech labels while technical table_ids are English.
recommendations.action: Populate bilingual descriptions for all assets in Collibra (EN and CZ fields). Ensure Collibra-to-Unity Catalog sync includes localized description fields or a mapping table so Czech-speaking users can discover assets by local names.
recommendations.estimated_impact: Improves adoption by local business users and reduces discovery friction.

anomaly_notes.explanation: All four business-requested entities (delivery performance, products, purchase orders, suppliers) are reported as missing while the analyzed set contains only four entities. This indicates a catalog completeness gap that blocks the business request and governance coverage.

Missing entities are referenced with Czech display names while existing table_ids use English identifiers (factv_purchase_order, dimv_product, etc.). This mismatch can cause discovery failures for Czech-speaking users and should be resolved via bilingual descriptions or aliasing in Collibra.

All four sampled entities share the same low articulation score (45) and 'warning' status, suggesting a systemic scoring rule, ingestion configuration issue, or validation threshold rather than isolated entity problems. Investigate scoring logic and ingestion completeness.

summary: High risk: four business-requested entities are missing from the catalog and all analyzed assets have low articulation and validation warnings. Immediate actions: create the four missing Collibra assets with bilingual descriptions and owners, then sync to Unity Catalog; follow with lineage documentation (P1) and governance tags (P2) to restore trust and enable business use.
